text: فَإِن يَصْبِرُوا۟ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَّهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَسْتَعْتِبُوا۟ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُعْتَبِينَ

translation.en.sahih: So [even] if they are patient, the Fire is a residence for them; and if they ask to appease [Allah], they will not be of those who are allowed to appease.
translation.id.indonesian: Jika mereka bersabar (menderita azab) maka nerakalah tempat diam mereka dan jika mereka mengemukakan alasan-alasan, maka tidaklah mereka termasuk orang-orang yang diterima alasannya.
